description: Beeco, founded by an environmental engineer in 2021, is an integrated organic waste management company based in Colombia. The initiative transforms organic waste from households and businesses into high-quality compost, promoting environmental education and sustainable practices. Operating in cities like Manizales and Villa Mar√≠a, Beeco provides containers for waste separation, collects organic materials, and educates clients on proper waste management, fostering a community committed to reducing landfill waste and enhancing agricultural practices.
name: Beeco
